desc: All natural, vegan-friendly, zero-waste - what's not to love? Made in small batches by hand in Portland, Oregon. As a registered Benefit corporation, sustainability is an integral part of who we are. Plastic-free, cruelty-free, & always gluten-free. Soaps, bath bombs, body butter, facial oil, shampoo bars, teas & more.

layout.text: saving the world, one soap bar at a time
affordable luxury self-care with a mission
